mapper.select: select id from bankcard where userId = #{userId} AND bankcardName = #{bankcardName} AND tiedCardPhone = #{tiedCardPhone}

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `bankdeductions` ( sys_userId, deductionproportion, orderId, userId, deductionstatus, deduction_money, deduction_time )VALUES(#{sys_userId},#{deductionproportion},#{orderId},#{userId},#{deductionstatus},#{deduction_money},#{deduction_time})
mapper.update: update Bankdeductions set deductionstatus = #{deductionstatus} where orderId = #{orderId} and deduction_time = #{deduction_time}
mapper.select: select count(id) from bankdeductions where sys_userId = #{sys_userId} and deduction_time = #{deduction_time} and deductionstatus = "扣款成功"
select sum(deduction_money) from bankdeductions where sys_userId = #{sys_userId} and deduction_time = #{deduction_time}
select ban.deduction_time,ban.deductionproportion,ban.deduction_money from bankdeductions ban,orders o where ban.orderId = #{orderId} AND o.companyId = #{companyId}

select ban.deduction_time,u.name,ord.surplus_money,ban.deductionproportion,ban.deduction_money from bankdeductions ban,user u,orders o,orderdetails ord where o.userId = u.id and o.id = ord.orderId and o.id = ban.orderId and o.companyId = #{companyId} and ban.deduction_time = #{deduction_time} and ban.sys_userId = #{sys_userId}
select o.*,ord.surplus_money,ord.realityBorrowMoney from orders o,orderdetails ord where o.id = ord.orderId and o.companyId = #{companyId} and o.id = #{id}

select deduction_time,deductionproportion,deduction_money from bankdeductions where orderId = #{orderId}
